{"step_by_step_thinking": "A cross-sectional study provides a snapshot of the population at a certain point in time, but it does not provide information on the temporal relationship between smoking and lung cancer. A randomized controlled trial is not ethical in this case because we cannot expose people to smoking to see if they develop lung cancer.
